channel.title: Other on Pavel Nikolov's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Other on Pavel Nikolov's blog

item.title: Retrospective on two years working from home
item.description: How it all began It’s been a little more than two years since I took the plunge and quit my job. It wasn’t an easy decision. It was something I had wanted to do for quite some time. At that time I didn’t have any saved money. On the other hand like most other people I had to pay rent, bills etc. So there was a little uncertainty. Luckily I was introduced to a guy in New York who was offering e-commerce platform services to people selling shoes, handbags etc.
